import React from "react"; import {connect} from "react-redux"; const CheckOutPage =({cartItems})=>{ const accumulateTotal=cartItems.reduce((accumulateTotal,cartItem)=> accumulateTotal+cartItem.price,0); return(
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{accumulateTotal}
) } const mapStateToProps =state=>({ cartItems:state.cart.cartItems }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckOutPage);
